snippet: King Abdullah II met with Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta on Thursday to discuss the flood of refugees crossing the border from Syria and their concerns about securing Syria’s large stockpiles of chemical weapons.
abstract: King Abdullah II of Jordan meets with Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta to discuss the flood of refugees crossing the border from Syria and their concerns about securing Syria’s large stockpiles of chemical weapons.
lead_paragraph: King Abdullah II met with Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta on Thursday to discuss the flood of refugees crossing the border from Syria and their concerns about securing Syria’s large stockpiles of chemical weapons.

headline.main: Jordan: King and Panetta Discuss Syria
